ground_truth: He slows down in front of one house with a triple garage and box tree on the front lawn and pulls up onto the driveway. As the woman carefully adjusts the buttons on her pristine white cuffs, Mac and Juno, wearing everyday casual clothes, stroll up to the double-fronted door flanked by two slim furs. Mac wipes his feet on the doormat. The woman with neatly combed long dark hair opens the door with a bright smile. Juno slaps Gerta's profit hand. Vanessa purses her lips. Vanessa looks penetratingly at Juno. On the staircase, Juno, in her loose checked shirt over jeans, passes a lineup of post photos of Mark and Vanessa in white. She wanders into Vanessa's en suite bathroom and contemplates herself in the large mirror above the basin, smoothing the front of her hair. There are several expensive-looking bottles and jars grouped around the basin, next to a white orchid in a pot. Opening one jar, she scoops out a finger full of cream and dabs it on her face. Then she does a bodybuilder-type snarl and pose. Picking up a bottle of perfume, she sniffs it and sprays her wrist, rubbing it against the other wrist. As she comes out of the bathroom, she collides with Mark. Her eye lights on the guitar. Mac points to some apparatus. Vanessa smiles proudly. Mac's attempted conversation is met with a baffled look. Then, he and both women look up towards the sound drifting down from the floor above. With a brittle smile, tall slim Vanessa hurries upstairs to find Mark and Juno duetting on guitars. Mac is looking at some forms. Mark closes the front door with a wry smile. Vanessa presses her hands together as if in prayer and lets him fold her in his arms. Vijay speeds up, leaving Bleeker alone on the running track. Two boys pass him as he slows to a walk. At school, a grey-head starkly built woman in a mauve cardigan sits behind the desk, looking disapprovingly at Juno bulging. The woman grudgingly signs a pink form and hands it to Juno. Juno smiles sweetly and comes out into the corridor. A technician spreads gel across Juno's distended belly with an ultrasound scan head. On a monitor next to her, Juno watches moving patches of light and dark take on a recognizable shape. Leah and Bren sigh with delight. Bren's lips tighten. With a look that could kill, the ultrasound technician leaves the room. In her room, with its walls covered in drawings, Juno lies on her bed, her legs propped up on cushions, gazing at the ultrasound print. She blinks thoughtfully and moments later is driving Mac's blue Previa out to Glacial Valley estate past its immaculate houses and lawns blanketed in snow.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: He decelerates his car as he approaches one particular house, notable for its triple garage and the box tree gracing the front lawn, and subsequently maneuvers the vehicle onto the driveway. As the woman meticulously adjusts the buttons on her impeccably white cuffs, Mac and Juno, dressed in their usual casual attire, leisurely walk up to the double-fronted door. This entrance is elegantly flanked by two slender fur trees. Taking a moment of consideration, Mac ensures to wipe his feet carefully on the welcoming doormat. The woman, whose long dark hair is neatly combed, opens the door with an exceptionally bright smile. Juno cheerfully slaps Gerta’s profit hand, while Vanessa remains composed, her lips forming a subtle purse. Vanessa delivers a penetrating gaze towards Juno. On the staircase, Juno, draped in her loose checked shirt over a pair of jeans, moves past a series of framed photographs of Mark and Vanessa, both clad in white. She meanders into Vanessa's en suite bathroom, contemplating her reflection in the generously sized mirror positioned above the basin, smoothing the front of her hair with care. Around the basin, there are numerous bottles and jars, which appear quite expensive, tastefully arranged next to a delicate white orchid in a pot. With curiosity, she opens one jar, extracting a small amount of cream with her finger and gently applying it to her face. Then, playfully, she adopts a bodybuilder-like snarl and pose. Next, she picks up a bottle of perfume, takes a sniff, and sprays a bit on her wrist, rubbing it against her other wrist to distribute the fragrance. As she exits the bathroom, she unexpectedly runs into Mark. Her attention is immediately captured by the guitar. Mac points out some intriguing apparatus nearby. Vanessa beams with pride. Mac's attempt at engaging in conversation is met with a look of utter confusion. Then, he, along with both women, directs his gaze upwards towards the sound softly drifting down from the floor above. With a brittle smile gracing her face, the tall and slim Vanessa hurries up the stairs, only to find Mark and Juno engrossed in a guitar duet. Meanwhile, Mac busies himself with the forms he is inspecting. Mark eventually closes the front door with a slightly mocking smile. Vanessa brings her hands together, resembling a prayer gesture, before allowing herself to be embraced by Mark. Vijay accelerates, leaving Bleeker solitary on the running track. Two boys overtake him as he slows to a casual walk. At school, a grey-haired, starkly built woman in a mauve cardigan sits behind a desk, casting a disapproving look at Juno, whose form is noticeably bulging. With reluctance, the woman signs a pink form, handing it to Juno. Juno responds with a sweet smile as she steps out into the corridor. A technician methodically applies gel across Juno's expanded belly with an ultrasound scan head. On a nearby monitor, Juno observes patches of light and dark evolving into a recognizable shape. Leah and Bren express their delight with audible sighs. Bren's lips tighten slightly. With a glare that could pierce, the ultrasound technician exits the room. In her own room, the walls adorned with an array of drawings, Juno reclines on her bed, her legs comfortably propped up on cushions, as she gazes thoughtfully at the ultrasound print. She blinks in contemplation, and soon thereafter finds herself driving Mac's blue Previa out to the Glacial Valley estate, past its immaculate houses and lawns, all of which are beautifully blanketed in a pristine layer of snow.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
As he approaches a particular house, notable for its striking triple garage and the well-maintained box tree that graces the front lawn, he begins to decelerate his car. He then carefully maneuvers the vehicle onto the expansive driveway. Meanwhile, the woman meticulously adjusts the buttons on her impeccably white cuffs, ensuring every detail of her appearance is perfect. Mac and Juno, both attired in their usual casual attire, casually stroll up to the imposing double-fronted door. This entrance is elegantly framed by two slender, graceful fur trees that enhance the house's inviting presence. 

Taking a thoughtful moment, Mac makes certain to wipe his feet meticulously on the welcoming doormat before entering. The woman, her long dark hair perfectly combed and flowing, opens the door with an exceptionally bright and inviting smile that lights up the entrance. Juno cheerfully gives Gerta's hand a playful slap, while Vanessa maintains her composure, her lips forming a subtle purse as she delivers a discerning gaze towards Juno. As Juno makes her way up the staircase, dressed in her comfortably loose checked shirt paired with a simple pair of jeans, she passes by a series of framed photographs capturing moments of Mark and Vanessa, both elegantly clad in white apparel.

She meanders into Vanessa's en suite bathroom, taking a moment to contemplate her reflection in the generously sized mirror positioned above the basin. She smooths the front of her hair with care, ensuring it is perfectly in place. Around the basin, numerous bottles and jars, which give the impression of being quite expensive, are tastefully arranged alongside a delicate white orchid in a pot, adding an air of sophistication to the space. With curiosity piqued, she opens one jar, carefully extracting a small amount of cream with her finger and gently applying it to her face. Then, in a lighthearted moment, she playfully adopts a bodybuilder-like snarl and pose, adding a touch of humor to her routine.

Next, she picks up a bottle of perfume, takes a thoughtful sniff, and sprays a bit on her wrist, subsequently rubbing it against her other wrist to evenly distribute the fragrance. As she exits the bathroom, she unexpectedly encounters Mark, her attention immediately captivated by the guitar he is holding. Mac, meanwhile, points out some intriguing apparatus nearby, sparking Vanessa's prideful beam. Mac's attempt to engage in conversation is met with a look of utter confusion from Vanessa. Then, he, along with both women, directs his gaze upwards toward the gentle sound drifting softly down from the floor above. With a brittle smile gracing her face, the tall and slim Vanessa hurries up the stairs, only to find Mark and Juno deeply engrossed in a guitar duet.

Meanwhile, Mac busies himself with the various forms he is meticulously inspecting. Eventually, Mark closes the front door, his face adorned with a slightly mocking smile. Vanessa brings her hands together in a gesture resembling a prayer before allowing herself to be warmly embraced by Mark. As Vijay accelerates, he leaves Bleeker solitary on the running track, where two boys overtake him as he slows to a carefree walk. At school, a grey-haired, starkly built woman, dressed in a mauve cardigan, sits behind her desk casting a disapproving look at Juno, whose form is now noticeably bulging. With evident reluctance, the woman signs a pink form, handing it over to Juno. Juno responds with a sweet, appreciative smile as she steps out into the corridor.

A technician, working methodically, applies gel across Juno's expanded belly with an ultrasound scan head. On a nearby monitor, Juno observes patches of light and dark gradually evolving into a recognizable shape. Leah and Bren, observing the screen, express their delight with audible sighs of happiness. Bren's lips tighten slightly as she processes the moment. With a glare that could pierce, the ultrasound technician exits the room, leaving behind a charged silence. In the sanctuary of her own room, where the walls are adorned with an array of drawings, Juno reclines on her bed, her legs comfortably propped up on cushions. She gazes thoughtfully at the ultrasound print, blinking in contemplation. Soon thereafter, she finds herself driving Mac's blue Previa out to the Glacial Valley estate, passing by its immaculate houses and lawns, all beautifully blanketed in a pristine, untouched layer of snow.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: He gradually slows the car as he approaches a house characterized by a triple garage and a box tree prominently displayed on the well-kept front lawn, finally pulling onto the wide driveway. Meanwhile, the woman in the car meticulously adjusts the buttons on her spotless white cuffs, ensuring they are perfectly aligned. Mac and Juno, both dressed in their casual, everyday attire, leisurely make their way toward the double-fronted entrance, which is elegantly framed by two tall, slender furs. As they approach, Mac conscientiously wipes his feet on the doormat to rid them of any dirt. The door swings open, revealing a woman with impeccably groomed long dark hair who greets them with a bright, welcoming smile. Juno playfully slaps Gerta's profit hand, while Vanessa, standing nearby, purses her lips slightly and casts a penetrating glance at Juno. As Juno ascends the staircase, clad in her loose checked shirt over a pair of jeans, her eyes skim over a series of photos lining the wall, capturing various moments of Mark and Vanessa dressed in white. Upon reaching the top, she casually wanders into Vanessa's en suite bathroom, where she pauses in front of the expansive mirror mounted above the basin, carefully smoothing down the front of her hair. Her eyes briefly scan the collection of luxurious bottles and jars arranged neatly on the basin, next to a delicate white orchid in a pot. Curiosity piqued, she unscrews the lid of one jar, dips a finger inside to retrieve a dollop of cream, and gently dabs it on her face. In front of the mirror, she humorously strikes a bodybuilder-type snarl and pose. Next, she picks up a bottle of perfume, inhales its scent, and sprays a little onto her wrist before rubbing her wrists together to transfer the fragrance. As she exits the bathroom, she unexpectedly collides with Mark, her gaze inadvertently lingering on the guitar nearby. Meanwhile, Mac directs attention to a piece of apparatus, prompting Vanessa to smile with evident pride. Mac's attempt at conversation, however, is met with a look of confusion. Their attention is soon diverted by a sound drifting down from the floor above, prompting both women, with Mac in tow, to look upward. With a brittle, forced smile, the tall, slim Vanessa quickly ascends the stairs to discover Mark and Juno in the midst of a duet with their guitars. While Mac is preoccupied with examining some paperwork, Mark closes the front door with a wry, amused smile. Vanessa, in a moment of affection, presses her hands together as if in prayer and allows him to embrace her warmly. In a different scene, Vijay picks up speed while leaving Bleeker alone on the running track. Two boys pass Bleeker as he gradually slows to a walk. Meanwhile, at school, a sternly built woman with grey hair, wearing a mauve cardigan, sits behind a desk. She casts a disapproving look at Juno, whose belly is noticeably bulging. With reluctance, the woman signs a pink form and hands it over to Juno, who accepts it with a sweet smile and exits into the corridor. In another setting, a technician spreads gel across Juno's swollen belly, preparing it for an ultrasound scan. Juno attentively watches as the monitor next to her displays moving patches of light and dark that slowly coalesce into a recognizable shape, eliciting sighs of delight from Leah and Bren. Meanwhile, Bren’s lips tighten with an unspoken emotion. The ultrasound technician, looking as if she holds a silent grudge, leaves the room. Later, in her room, whose walls are adorned with various drawings, Juno lies on her bed with her legs elevated on cushions, thoughtfully gazing at the ultrasound print she holds. After a moment of reflection, she finds herself driving Mac's blue Previa through the serene Glacial Valley estate, passing by its pristine houses and lawns blanketed in a recent layer of snow.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: He slows in front of a house with a triple garage and box tree, parking in the driveway. The woman adjusts her white cuffs as Mac and Juno, in casual attire, approach the double-fronted door flanked by slim furs. Mark closes the front door with a wry smile, and Vanessa presses her hands together before embracing him. Vijay speeds ahead on the track, leaving Bleeker behind. During an ultrasound, Juno observes the developing life on the monitor, with Leah and Bren reacting emotionally. However, Bren's expression tightens, and the technician exits with palpable tension. In her room, adorned with drawings, Juno reflects on the ultrasound image before driving Mac's blue Previa through the snow-covered Glacial Valley estate.

test_cases.description: He slows down in front of one house with a triple garage, an uncommon feature often indicating ample space for vehicles, and a box tree on the front lawn, a type of formal shrub known for its dense foliage, and pulls up onto the driveway. As the woman carefully adjusts the buttons on her pristine white cuffs, reminiscent of the crisp attire often worn in professional or formal settings, Mac and Juno, wearing everyday casual clothes including relaxed jeans and T-shirts, stroll up to the double-fronted door flanked by two slim furs—trees that are often used in landscaped gardens for their elegant appearance. Mac wipes his feet on the doormat, a simple gesture suggesting attention to cleanliness. The woman with neatly combed long dark hair, styled meticulously, opens the door with a bright smile. Juno slaps Gerta's profit hand, a gesture of camaraderie perhaps stemming from a recent shared success, and Vanessa purses her lips. Vanessa looks penetratingly at Juno with the kind of intensity that can cut through any facade. On the staircase, Juno, in her loose checked shirt over jeans that give her a relaxed and laid-back look, passes a lineup of post photos of Mark and Vanessa in white, possibly snapshots from formal occasions or themed events. She wanders into Vanessa's en suite bathroom, a luxurious attached space, and contemplates herself in the large mirror above the basin, smoothing the front of her hair, perhaps reflecting on a new phase of life. There are several expensive-looking bottles and jars grouped around the basin, suggesting a penchant for high-end skincare, next to a white orchid in a pot, a symbol of beauty and sophistication. Opening one jar, she scoops out a finger full of cream and dabs it on her face. Then she does a bodybuilder-type snarl and pose, likely mimicking the exaggerated expressions seen in fitness shows. Picking up a bottle of perfume, she sniffs it and sprays her wrist, rubbing it against the other wrist, the traditional method to diffuse the scent. As she comes out of the bathroom, she collides with Mark. Her eye lights on the guitar, a classic symbol of musical creativity. Mac points to some apparatus, indicating perhaps a piece of modern technology or entertainment equipment. Vanessa smiles proudly, suggesting pride in the possessions or accomplishments on display. Mac's attempted conversation is met with a baffled look, perhaps due to a mismatch of social cues or interests. Then, he and both women look up towards the sound drifting down from the floor above, likely musical notes played skillfully. With a brittle smile, tall slim Vanessa hurries upstairs to find Mark and Juno duetting on guitars, showcasing their shared musical talent. Mac is looking at some forms, possibly documents or plans that require attention. Mark closes the front door with a wry smile, a gesture that hints at irony or amusement. Vanessa presses her hands together as if in prayer, an expression of hope or gratitude, and lets him fold her in his arms, reinforcing their bond. Vijay speeds up, leaving Bleeker alone on the running track at the local sports complex. Two boys pass him as he slows to a walk. At school, a grey-head starkly built woman in a mauve cardigan, perhaps the school administrator, sits behind the desk looking disapprovingly at Juno bulging, her pregnancy now unmistakable. The woman grudgingly signs a pink form, an administrative document often related to school processes, and hands it to Juno. Juno smiles sweetly and comes out into the corridor. A technician spreads gel across Juno's distended belly, preparing for an ultrasound scan, with an ultrasound scan head. On a monitor next to her, Juno watches moving patches of light and dark take on a recognizable shape, an experience that vividly captures the miracle of life. Leah and Bren sigh with delight, enchanted by the sight of the developing baby. Bren's lips tighten, possibly with a mix of emotions. With a look that could kill, the ultrasound technician leaves the room, perhaps offended or irritated. In her room, with its walls covered in drawings depicting her artistic spirit, Juno lies on her bed, her legs propped up on cushions, gazing at the ultrasound print, an image that represents a future yet to unfold. She blinks thoughtfully and moments later is driving Mac's blue Previa, a spacious and reliable minivan, out to Glacial Valley estate, a picturesque area, past its immaculate houses and lawns blanketed in snow, creating a serene winter landscape.

As she comes out of the bathroom she collides with Mark. Her eye lights on the guitar. Mac points to some apparatus. Vanessa smiles proudly. Mac's attempted conversation is met with a baffled look. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. Then he and both women look up towards the sound drifting down from the floor above. With a brittle smile tall slim Vanessa hurries upstairs to find Mark and Juno duetting on guitars. Mac is looking at some forms. Mark closes the front door with a wry smile. Vanessa presses her hands together as if in prayer and let us him fold her in his arms. Vijay speeds up leaving Bleeker alone on the running track. Two boys pass him as he slows to a walk. At school a greyhead starkly built woman in a mauve cardigan sits behind the desk looking disapprovingly at Juno bulging. The woman grudgingly signs a pink form and hands it to Juno. Juno smiles sweetly and comes out into the corridor. A technician spreads gel across Juno's distended belly with an ultrasound scan head. On a monitor next to her Juno watches moving patches of light and dark take on a recognizable shape. Leah and Bren sigh with delight. Bren's lips tighten. With a look that could kill the ultrasound technician leaves the room. In her room with its walls covered in drawings. Juno lies on her bed her legs propped up on cushions gazing at the ultrasound print. She blinks thoughtfully and moments later is driving Mac's blue Previa out to Glacial Valley estate past its immaculate houses and lawns blanketed in snow.

She blinks lazily and moments later is driving Plate's orange Trans Am out to Crystal Canyon metropolis past its immaculate skyscrapers and patios blanketed in petals.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: He accelerates past a house with a double garage and rose bushes on the front lawn and rolls down onto the driveway. As the man quickly fastens the cuffs on his pristine white shirt, Nina and Leo, wearing formal business attire, skip up to the single-fronted gate flanked by two towering pines. Leo kicks his shoes on the grass. The man with wild curly blonde hair closes the gate with a bright grin. Nina shakes Trevor's success foot. Oliver raises his eyebrows. Oliver glances curiously at Nina. On the carpet, Nina, in her thick wool sweater over leggings, sidesteps a collection of family paintings featuring Jake and Oliver in black. She meanders into Oliver's spacious bedroom and surveys herself in the small mirror above the dresser, tidying the back of her hair. There are several cheap-looking knickknacks grouped around the dresser, next to a red tulip in a vase. Picking up a bottle, she dabs a drop of oil and massages it on her hands. Then she does a ballet-like twirl and leap. Grabbing a jar of ointment, she sniffs it and dots it on her neck, rubbing it with her fingers. As she exits the bedroom, she brushes past Jake. Her gaze rests on the piano. Leo gestures to some gadgets. Oliver beams warmly. Leo's attempted dialogue is met with a puzzled grin. Then, he and both men glance towards the music echoing from the attic above. With a tense grin, short plump Oliver rushes downstairs to find Jake and Nina harmonizing on drums. Leo is examining some documents. Jake opens the kitchen window with a knowing grin. Oliver claps his hands together as if in applause and welcomes him into his embrace. Priya slows down, leaving Clover behind on the hiking trail. Two girls overtake her as she quickens to a jog. At work, a white-haired diminutive man in a green sweater stands beside the printer, observing skeptically at Nina stretching. The man reluctantly stamps a blue paper and passes it to Nina. Nina grins mischievously and enters the office. A nurse applies cream across Nina's enlarged abdomen with an ultrasound scanner. On a display beside her, Nina observes shifting shadows and shapes forming a familiar outline. Emma and Claire gasp with amazement. Claire's nose crinkles. With a look that could freeze, the ultrasound nurse exits the space. In her studio, with its walls adorned in posters, Nina sprawls on her sofa, her feet propped up on pillows, staring at the ultrasound print. She sighs deeply and moments later is steering Leo's red Tesla out to Frosty Hills estate past its pristine gardens and streets covered in rain.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Mac and Juno arrive at a house with a triple garage. As they approach, Vanessa greets them with a smile. Juno explores the house, contemplating herself in the mirror and trying on Vanessa's cream and perfume. She encounters Mark, noting his guitar, as Vanessa heads upstairs to find Mark and Juno playing music together. Meanwhile, Vijay speeds up on a track, leaving Bleeker behind. At school, Juno receives a disapproving look from a grey-haired woman who signs a form for her. Later, during an ultrasound, Juno watches the screen with Leah and Bren, despite the technician's cold demeanor. Back home, Juno reflects on the ultrasound print and drives Mac's car through a snowy estate.

test_cases.name: Reverse Segments Order
test_cases.description: She blinks thoughtfully and moments later is driving Mac's blue Previa out to Glacial Valley estate past its immaculate houses and lawns blanketed in snow Juno lies on her bed her legs propped up on cushions gazing at the ultrasound print In her room with its walls covered in drawings With a look that could kill the ultrasound technician leaves the room Bren's lips tighten Leah and Bren sigh with delight On a monitor next to her Juno watches moving patches of light and dark take on a recognizable shape A technician spreads gel across Juno's distended belly with an ultrasound scan head Juno smiles sweetly and comes out into the corridor The woman grudgingly signs a pink form and hands it to Juno At school a greyhead starkly built woman in a mauve cardigan sits behind the desk looking disapprovingly at Juno bulging Two boys pass him as he slows to a walk Vijay speeds up leaving Bleeker alone on the running track Vanessa presses her hands together as if in prayer and let us him fold her in his arms Mark closes the front door with a wry smile Mac is looking at some forms With a brittle smile tall slim Vanessa hurries upstairs to find Mark and Juno duetting on guitars Then he and both women look up towards the sound drifting down from the floor above Mac's attempted conversation is met with a baffled look Vanessa smiles proudly Mac points to some apparatus Her eye lights on the guitar As she comes out of the bathroom she collides with Mark Picking up a bottle of perfume she sniffs it and sprays her wrist rubbing it against the other wrist Then she does a bodybuildertype snarl and pose Opening one jar she scoops out a finger full of cream and dabs it on her face There are several expensivelooking bottles and jars grouped around the basin next to a white orchid in a pot She wanders into Vanessa's en suite bathroom and contemplates herself in the large mirror above the basin smoothing the front of her hair On the staircase Juno in her loose checked shirt over jeans passes a lineup of post photos of Mark and Vanessa in white Vanessa looks penetratingly at Juno Vanessa purses her lips Juno slaps Gerta's profit hand The woman with neatly combed long dark hair opens the door with a bright smile Mac wipes his feet on the doormat As the woman carefully adjusts the buttons on her pristine white cuffs Mac and Juno wearing everyday casual clothes stroll up to the doublefronted door flanked by two slim furs He slows down in front of one house with a triple garage and box tree on the front lawn and pulls up onto the driveway
